Name.BusinessNameLine1: HILLEL FOUNDATION FOR JEWISH LIFE AT THE

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO SERVE THE CAMPUS JEWISH COMMUNITY AT THE UNIVERSITY OF WASHINGTON, SEATTLE, WASHINGTON.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO SERVE THE CAMPUS JEWISH COMMUNITY, WHICH INCLUDES STUDENTS, FACULTY, STAFF AND RECENT GRADUATES OF THE UNIVERSITY OF WASHINGTON, SEATTLE, WASHINGTON.
IRS990.Description: Hillel UW creates meaningful Jewish experiences for 18-32 year olds through diverse communities and innovative programs. In addition to the Undergraduate Program, the Jconnect Seattle initiative serves graduate students and post-college young adults. Hillel UW is a broad "tent" under which a wide range of special interest groups led by students, young adults and staff create meaningful Jewish experiences. Programs include Jewish holiday celebrations, classes, service learning projects, outdoor exploration and sports, trips to Israel, drama, the arts and much more. In addition, Hillel UW is the only Hillel in the world providing affordable and confidential counseling services. This year we reached over 2,500 participants through more than 350 diverse programs and activities.
